sections.title: A. Village Edge
sections.readaloud: Old Maera meets you by a standing stone: “Bring back the idol and hush the hill.”
sections.body: Roll Reaction or Influence as a Quick Contest.

sections.title: B. Sink-Stairs
sections.readaloud: Collapsed stone stairs spiral into dark.
sections.body: Tie rope; roll Climbing; failure leads to falling.
